name: Crazy Lunch
description:
Your lunch disappeared? You suspect your colleagues?
The problem is that little strange creatures appeared on your desk. You will have a lot of fun trying to get rid of them.

In this game you will get:
• Play absolutely for FREE, no in-app purchases.
• Two game modes
• Don’t let monsters to steal your lunch! Stop attacks of creatures on your desktop.
• Find identical objects!
Monsters hide your lunch behind their backs. You need to find identical objects and chase them away from your plate.
• Funny sounds and lively music
• Lovely hand-drawn creatures
• A lot of tasty bonuses and big surprises

It is a fun party game. Crazy Lunch develops memory, typing and reaction skills in a funny and easy way. You and your children will definitely like these odd creatures in bright jogging shoes and yellow gloves!
